DOC.brief_summary: This study examine difference satiety response structurally different wholegrain rye product .
DOC.brief_title: Chewy Satiety - Interplay Between Food Structure , Oral Processing Satiety
DOC.detailed_description: The study consist satiety trial mastication trial . The satiety trial consist five study visit . Five cereal product berry soup present random order subject serve one study visit ( crossover study design ) . Each meal consist rye product wheat bread provide 190 kcal energy 3 dl berry soup ( 3 dl ) provide 140 kcal energy . The participant instructed evaluate satiety related sensation eat test food , right eat every 30 min 210 min breakfast consumption . The evaluated sensation hunger , fullness , satiety , desire eat prospective food consumption ( `` How much would able eat right ? `` ) , `` thirstiness '' , `` mood '' , `` vigourosness '' `` pleasantness '' . `` Pleasantness '' evaluate right eat test food . Cereal food sample 3-digit number code offer participant random order mastication trial . The study product rye product vary structure . First participant ask evaluate expect satiety product ( How filling would expect portion scale 0 ( =not full ) 10 ( =extremely full ) ) . Secondly food serve participant three portion participant ask masticate portion considers ready swallow . Instead swallow bolus expectorate plastic container keep ice . The mastication process characterize measure electrical activity facial muscle electromyography ( EMG ) . The mastication process video-recorded support data handling .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.525 kg/m2 Habit eat breakfast Significant change body weight ( + 4 kg ) previous year Smoking Pregnant lactate Missing teeth ( except 3rd molar ) Acute temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) Dietary restriction possibly affect study ( celiac disease , allergies aversion cereal foods/high carbohydrate food ) Abnormal eat behaviour ( accord EDDS ( Eating Disorder Diagnostic Scale ) )
